Introduction

Choim is a South Korean singer, model, and TV personality currently under C.C Entertainment. She was a member of the short-lived girl group CAMILA, which she also founded and managed, and the girl group LAYSHA.

She made her solo debut on August 21, 2019, with the single "Romeo".
